div.p: To the Central Bureau of Agriculture of South Australia

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found. The text given here is from a report of the meeting of the Central Bureau of Agriculture held on 29 February 1892 (South Australlian register, 3 March 1892, p. 3).

p.seg: [Baron von Mueller wrote forwarding the scientific names of two kinds of thistle. A short discussion ensued as to the destruction of thistles in South Australia, and the Bureau requested that District Councils who issued notices for their destruction should see that the notices were carried out.]
